name: Escape The Island (itch) (Death5888)
description:
This is a game I made in a few short weeks for a project at college in which I was asked to make a video and summary as well as a download link so it could be shown to the school.

As one of hundreds of robots made by man, you are sent to a mysterious floating island which is known to have mystic gems which have aided man kind in making great scientific and medicinal advancements. Due to the dangerous monsters set to protect this island, humans no longer visit it to try and gather the gems, instead they send robots. You are tasked with gathering all the games and returning them to the humans, if you fail, you won't be seen again.
